elements.name: variable_testing
elements.html:
variables

Test to make sure variables are working as expected - make invisible when live

  • survey_variable = {survey_variable}

elements.name: testing_warning
elements.html: -- End of testing panel --

elements.name: pre_module_survey_header_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: Header - Pre-module survey: Displays if {survey_variable}='pre_module', conditional logic in library item.

elements.name: post_module_survey_header_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: Header - Post-module survey: Displays if {survey_variable}='post_module', conditional logic in library item.

elements.name: post_lesson_survey_header_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: Header - Post-lesson survey: Displays for all lessons, this is when {survey_variable}<>'pre_module' and {survey_variable} <> 'post_module', conditional logic in library item.

elements.name: pre_module_survey_questions_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: Question panel - Pre-module survey: Displays if {survey_variable}='pre_module', conditional logic in library item.

elements.name: post_module_survey_questions_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NOTE: Question panel - Post-module survey: Displays if {survey_variable}='post_module', conditional logic in library item.
